videos.description: Tyrese Maxey hits the trey vs. Miami Heat

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyrese Maxey hits the trey vs. Miami Heat) 2021/12/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyrese Maxey hits the trey vs. Miami Heat

videos.description: Gabe Vincent extends the Heat's lead as he drains the long 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Vincent cans deep 3 for Miami) 2021/12/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Vincent cans deep 3 for Miami

videos.description: Kyle Lowry dribbles into the long 3-pointer late in the second quarter.
videos.headline: Lowry buries a long 3

videos.headline: Check out this sweet pass from Duncan Robinson

videos.description: Tyrese Maxey somehow gets the and-1 to fall

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyrese Maxey somehow gets the and-1 to fall) 2021/12/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyrese Maxey somehow gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Joel Embiid swats the shot away leading to a fastbreak finished with a Shake Milton and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Embiid's block sets up the Milton and-1) 2021/12/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Embiid's block sets up the Milton and-1

videos.description: Max Strus gets the and-1 to fall

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Max Strus gets the and-1 to fall) 2021/12/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Max Strus gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Danny Green hits the 3-pointer, cutting into the Heat's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wells Fargo Center erupts after Green 3) 2021/12/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wells Fargo Center erupts after Green 3

videos.description: Gabe Vincent splashes the 3-pointer off the offensive rebound, giving Miami the lead in the final minute.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Gabe Vincent comes up clutch with huge 3 in the 4th) 2021/12/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gabe Vincent comes up clutch with huge 3 in the 4th

videos.description: The Heat are able to hold on and take down the 76ers.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Heat hold on for win over 76ers) 2021/12/15 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Heat hold on for win over 76ers
